amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for VA medical and prosthetic research by $5 million and reduce funding for Americorps grants by $12.2 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funding for AmeriCorps grants and to transfer money to the medical and prosthetic research account for veterans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 154 - 264 (Roll no. 452).
